channel.title: Coloring Help
channel.description: Ok, I have galkon's client and when I type @blu@, @red@, @mag@, etc. It will display the color in the box, where your user name is. What it doesn't do is it displays @red@Your text here. it just displays the @red@ tag in both the chatbox (where everyone types, not where your username it) and the text above the player. Help would be appreciated, thanks!

item.title: Coloring Help
item.dc:creator: @_James_scape _James_scape
item.description:
@_James_scape wrote:

Ok, I have galkon’s client and when I type @blu@, @red@, @mag@, etc. It will display the color in the box, where your user name is. What it doesn’t do is it displays @red@Your text here. it just displays the @red@ tag in both the chatbox (where everyone types, not where your username it) and the text above the player. Help would be appreciated, thanks!

Read full topic
